subject: RE: [junit] Starter
msgSnippet: Perhaps the first page of THE FINE MANUAL that I just know we all have READ, should be a short guide on how not to get flamed crispy with your first post to
messageBody:
Perhaps the first page of THE FINE MANUAL that I just know we all have
READ, should be a short guide on how not to get flamed crispy with your
first post to the email list?

Or we could try a FREQUENTLY ASKED NEWBIE QUESTIONS as the normal FAQ is
obviously not cutting it for some people.

Just a thought!

Simon

P.S. Welcome! They don't bite too bad around here ... once you get the
first couple of stupid questions out of your system! :-)

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Simon P. Chappell simon.chappell@...
Java Programming Specialist www.landsend.com
Lands' End, Inc. (608) 935-4526

>From: Bob Towers [mailto:bob.towers@...]

>Oh and PS. Welcome
>

>Junit. Can any
>> one

>>
>>
>> short answer: java junit.textui.TestRunner myClass
>>
>> long answer: READ THE DO-CU-MEN-TA-TION THAT COMES WITH JUNIT !!
>>
>> ok I promise, next time I'll simply ignore mails like yours.
>>
>>
>> -Vladimir
